conclusion: Preliminary objection dismissed (ratione materiae);Remainder inadmissible;No violation of Art. 10;Violation of Art. 6-1;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient
docname: CASE OF LEROY v. FRANCE - [Turkish Translation] by the COE Human Rights Trust Fund
